name: Aftermath Metro
description:
Aftermath Metro is a 3D low poly walking simulator with a horrific atmosphere where you play as a man looking for his friend in a post-apocalyptic metro station.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 This project is a project made by 6 students from E-Artsup Paris in their first year of Game Art and Creative Coding during 2 months .

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------The Aftermath Team behind the Project ------------------------

Elliott Lefevre - Programer, Story,  Sound Integrations, Mechanics

Sasha Thibaudier - Programer, Sound Design, Tester

Kevin Nguyen - Lead Designer,  Level Design, Assets Integrations, Post Processing, Texturing & UI

Matthieu Mode-Yap - Designer, Assets, Beta Tester, Menu

Emilien Diboine - 3D Modeler, Assets

Emilie Duboudin - Programer
